titleStmt.title: A treatise of the sacrament of the confirmation wherein is shewed the necessary spirituall profit, and excellencie of this sacrament. Composed by W.R.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Richard, 1566-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Gerard Pinchon, at the signe of the Coleyn,

notesStmt.note: W.R. = Richard Smith, Bp. of Chalcedon.
Errata on verso of I3, final page.
Some print faded and show-through and some pages stained.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
